name: Quebecoin
description: Quebecoin is a blockchain-based monetary alternative founded in 2014 specifically for the Québec region. Quebecoin is independent and not controlled by any intermediary. Quebecoin can be used anywhere and therefore has international users. Its development team is working to build a network of supportive businesses, with emphasis on Québec and other French-speaking countries. For more information, please visit: https://quebecoin.ca/.
